GeneDef.label: nine lives
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene experience a growth of separate nerves only loosely attached to the primary nervous system. The extra sensory information processed by this secondary set of pseudo-thinking flesh is incredibly specialized towards avoiding danger, automatically forcing the body into motion to avoid nine attacks. But the tax on the nerves is great, burning themselves out on the ninth application and requiring time to regrow after.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Once a month the pawn will dodge Nine attacks resulting in invisibility, The Gene cannot doge explosives and Gas attacks.
